Then<S>5119</S> came<S>4334</S> to Jesus<S>2424</S> scribes<S>1122</S> and<S>2532</S> Pharisees<S>5330</S>, which were of<S>575</S> Jerusalem<S>2414</S>, saying<S>3004</S>,
Why<S>1302</S> do thy<S>4675</S> disciples<S>3101</S> transgress<S>3845</S> the tradition<S>3862</S> of the elders<S>4245</S>? for<S>1063</S> they wash<S>3538</S> not<S>3756</S> their<S>846</S> hands<S>5495</S> when<S>3752</S> they eat<S>2068</S> bread<S>740</S>.
But<S>1161</S> he answered<S>611</S> and said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Why<S>1302</S> do ye<S>5210</S> also<S>2532</S> transgress<S>3845</S> the commandment<S>1785</S> of God<S>2316</S> by<S>1223</S> your<S>5216</S> tradition<S>3862</S>?
For<S>1063</S> God<S>2316</S> commanded<S>1781</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Honour<S>5091</S> thy<S>4675</S> father<S>3962</S> and<S>2532</S> mother<S>3384</S>: and<S>2532</S>, He that curseth<S>2551</S> father<S>3962</S> or<S>2228</S> mother<S>3384</S>, let him die<S>5053</S> the death<S>2288</S>.
But<S>1161</S> ye<S>5210</S> say<S>3004</S>, Whosoever<S>3739</S> <S>302</S> shall say<S>2036</S> to his father<S>3962</S> or<S>2228</S> his mother<S>3384</S>, It is a gift<S>1435</S>, by<S>1537</S> whatsoever<S>3739</S> <S>1437</S> thou mightest be profited<S>5623</S> by me<S>1700</S>;
And<S>2532</S> honour<S>5091</S> not<S>3364</S> his<S>846</S> father<S>3962</S> or<S>2228</S> his<S>846</S> mother<S>3384</S>, he shall be free. Thus<S>2532</S> have ye made<S>208</S> the commandment<S>1785</S> of God<S>2316</S> of none effect<S>208</S> by<S>1223</S> your<S>5216</S> tradition<S>3862</S>.
 Ye hypocrites<S>5273</S>, well<S>2573</S> did<S>4395</S> Esaias<S>2268</S> prophesy<S>4395</S> of<S>4012</S> you<S>5216</S>, saying<S>3004</S>,
This<S>3778</S> people<S>2992</S> draweth nigh<S>1448</S> unto me<S>3427</S> with their<S>846</S> mouth<S>4750</S>, and<S>2532</S> honoureth<S>5091</S> me<S>3165</S> with their lips<S>5491</S>; but<S>1161</S> their<S>846</S> heart<S>2588</S> is<S>568</S> far<S>4206</S> from<S>575</S> me<S>1700</S>.
But<S>1161</S> in vain<S>3155</S> they do worship<S>4576</S> me<S>3165</S>, teaching<S>1321</S> for doctrines<S>1319</S> the commandments<S>1778</S> of men<S>444</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he called<S>4341</S> the multitude<S>3793</S>, and said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Hear<S>191</S>, and<S>2532</S> understand<S>4920</S>:
Not<S>3756</S> that which goeth<S>1525</S> into<S>1519</S> the mouth<S>4750</S> defileth<S>2840</S> a man<S>444</S>; but<S>235</S> that which cometh<S>1607</S> out of<S>1537</S> the mouth<S>4750</S>, this<S>5124</S> defileth<S>2840</S> a man<S>444</S>.
Then<S>5119</S> came<S>4334</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S>, and said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Knowest thou<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> the Pharisees<S>5330</S> were offended<S>4624</S>, after they heard<S>191</S> this saying<S>3056</S>?
But<S>1161</S> he answered<S>611</S> and said<S>2036</S>, Every<S>3956</S> plant<S>5451</S>, which<S>3739</S> my<S>3450</S> heavenly<S>3770</S> Father<S>3962</S> hath<S>5452</S> not<S>3756</S> planted<S>5452</S>, shall be rooted up<S>1610</S>.
Let<S>863</S> them<S>846</S> alone<S>863</S>: they be<S>1526</S> blind<S>5185</S> leaders<S>3595</S> of the blind<S>5185</S>. And<S>1161</S> if<S>1437</S> the blind<S>5185</S> lead<S>3594</S> the blind<S>5185</S>, both<S>297</S> shall fall<S>4098</S> into<S>1519</S> the ditch<S>999</S>.
Then<S>1161</S> answered<S>611</S> Peter<S>4074</S> and said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Declare<S>5419</S> unto us<S>2254</S> this<S>5026</S> parable<S>3850</S>.
And<S>1161</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> said<S>2036</S>, Are<S>2075</S> ye<S>5210</S> also<S>2532</S> yet<S>188</S> without understanding<S>801</S>?
Do<S>3539</S> not<S>3768</S> ye<S>3539</S> yet<S>3768</S> understand<S>3539</S>, that<S>3754</S> whatsoever<S>3956</S> entereth in<S>1531</S> at<S>1519</S> the mouth<S>4750</S> goeth<S>5562</S> into<S>1519</S> the belly<S>2836</S>, and<S>2532</S> is cast out<S>1544</S> into<S>1519</S> the draught<S>856</S>?
But<S>1161</S> those things which<S>3588</S> proceed<S>1607</S> out of<S>1537</S> the mouth<S>4750</S> come forth<S>1831</S> from<S>1537</S> the heart<S>2588</S>; and they<S>2548</S> defile<S>2840</S> the man<S>444</S>.
For<S>1063</S> out of<S>1537</S> the heart<S>2588</S> proceed<S>1831</S> evil<S>4190</S> thoughts<S>1261</S>, murders<S>5408</S>, adulteries<S>3430</S>, fornications<S>4202</S>, thefts<S>2829</S>, false witness<S>5577</S>, blasphemies<S>988</S>:
These<S>5023</S> are<S>2076</S> the things which<S>3588</S> defile<S>2840</S> a man<S>444</S>: but<S>1161</S> to eat<S>5315</S> with unwashen<S>449</S> hands<S>5495</S> defileth<S>2840</S> not<S>3756</S> a man<S>444</S>.
Then<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> went<S>1831</S> thence<S>1564</S>, and departed<S>402</S> into<S>1519</S> the coasts<S>3313</S> of Tyre<S>5184</S> and<S>2532</S> Sidon<S>4605</S>.
And<S>2532</S>, behold<S>2400</S>, a woman<S>1135</S> of Canaan<S>5478</S> came<S>1831</S> out of<S>575</S> the same<S>1565</S> coasts<S>3725</S>, and cried<S>2905</S> unto him<S>846</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Have mercy<S>1653</S> on me<S>3165</S>, O Lord<S>2962</S>, thou Son<S>5207</S> of David<S>1138</S>; my<S>3450</S> daughter<S>2364</S> is grievously<S>2560</S> vexed with a devil<S>1139</S>.
But<S>1161</S> he answered<S>611</S> her<S>846</S> not<S>3756</S> a word<S>3056</S>. And<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S> came<S>4334</S> and besought<S>2065</S> him<S>846</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Send<S>630</S> her<S>846</S> away<S>630</S>; for<S>3754</S> she crieth<S>2896</S> after<S>3693</S> us<S>2257</S>.
But<S>1161</S> he answered<S>611</S> and said<S>2036</S>, I am<S>649</S> not<S>3756</S> sent<S>649</S> but<S>1508</S> unto<S>1519</S> the lost<S>622</S> sheep<S>4263</S> of the house<S>3624</S> of Israel<S>2474</S>.
Then<S>1161</S> came she<S>2064</S> and worshipped<S>4352</S> him<S>846</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Lord<S>2962</S>, help<S>997</S> me<S>3427</S>.
But<S>1161</S> he answered<S>611</S> and said<S>2036</S>, It is<S>2076</S> not<S>3756</S> meet<S>2570</S> to take<S>2983</S> the children's<S>5043</S> bread<S>740</S>, and<S>2532</S> to cast<S>906</S> it to dogs<S>2952</S>.
And<S>1161</S> she said<S>2036</S>, Truth<S>3483</S>, Lord<S>2962</S>: yet<S>2532</S> <S>1063</S> the dogs<S>2952</S> eat<S>2068</S> of<S>575</S> the crumbs<S>5589</S> which<S>3588</S> fall<S>4098</S> from<S>575</S> their<S>846</S> masters'<S>2962</S> table<S>5132</S>.
Then<S>5119</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> answered<S>611</S> and said<S>2036</S> unto her<S>846</S>, O<S>5599</S> woman<S>1135</S>, great<S>3173</S> is thy<S>4675</S> faith<S>4102</S>: be it<S>1096</S> unto thee<S>4671</S> even as<S>5613</S> thou wilt<S>2309</S>. And<S>2532</S> her<S>846</S> daughter<S>2364</S> was made whole<S>2390</S> from<S>575</S> that very<S>1565</S> hour<S>5610</S>.
And<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> departed<S>3327</S> from thence<S>1564</S>, and came<S>2064</S> nigh unto<S>3844</S> the sea<S>2281</S> of Galilee<S>1056</S>; and<S>2532</S> went up<S>305</S> into<S>1519</S> a mountain<S>3735</S>, and sat down<S>2521</S> there<S>1563</S>.
And<S>2532</S> great<S>4183</S> multitudes<S>3793</S> came<S>4334</S> unto him<S>846</S>, having<S>2192</S> with<S>3326</S> them those that were <S>1438</S> lame<S>5560</S>, blind<S>5185</S>, dumb<S>2974</S>, maimed<S>2948</S>, and<S>2532</S> many<S>4183</S> others<S>2087</S>, and<S>2532</S> cast<S>4496</S> them<S>846</S> down<S>4496</S> at<S>3844</S> Jesus'<S>2424</S> feet<S>4228</S>; and<S>2532</S> he healed<S>2323</S> them<S>846</S>:
Insomuch that<S>5620</S> the multitude<S>3793</S> wondered<S>2296</S>, when they saw<S>991</S> the dumb<S>2974</S> to speak<S>2980</S>, the maimed<S>2948</S> to be whole<S>5199</S>, the lame<S>5560</S> to walk<S>4043</S>, and<S>2532</S> the blind<S>5185</S> to see<S>991</S>: and<S>2532</S> they glorified<S>1392</S> the God<S>2316</S> of Israel<S>2474</S>.
Then<S>1161</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> called<S>4341</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S> unto him, and said<S>2036</S>, I have compassion<S>4697</S> on<S>1909</S> the multitude<S>3793</S>, because<S>3754</S> they continue<S>4357</S> with me<S>3427</S> now<S>2235</S> three<S>5140</S> days<S>2250</S>, and<S>2532</S> have<S>2192</S> nothing<S>3756</S> <S>5101</S> to eat<S>5315</S>: and<S>2532</S> I will<S>2309</S> not<S>3756</S> send<S>630</S> them<S>846</S> away<S>630</S> fasting<S>3523</S>, lest<S>3379</S> they faint<S>1590</S> in<S>1722</S> the way<S>3598</S>.
And<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S> say<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Whence<S>4159</S> should we<S>2254</S> have so much<S>5118</S> bread<S>740</S> in<S>1722</S> the wilderness<S>2047</S>, as<S>5620</S> to fill<S>5526</S> so great<S>5118</S> a multitude<S>3793</S>?
And<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, How many<S>4214</S> loaves<S>740</S> have ye<S>2192</S>? And<S>1161</S> they said<S>2036</S>, Seven<S>2033</S>, and<S>2532</S> a few<S>3641</S> little fishes<S>2485</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he commanded<S>2753</S> the multitude<S>3793</S> to sit down<S>377</S> on<S>1909</S> the ground<S>1093</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he took<S>2983</S> the seven<S>2033</S> loaves<S>740</S> and<S>2532</S> the fishes<S>2486</S>, and gave thanks<S>2168</S>, and brake<S>2806</S> them, and<S>2532</S> gave<S>1325</S> to his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S>, and<S>1161</S> the disciples<S>3101</S> to the multitude<S>3793</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they did<S>5315</S> all<S>3956</S> eat<S>5315</S>, and<S>2532</S> were filled<S>5526</S>: and<S>2532</S> they took up<S>142</S> of the broken<S>2801</S> meat that was left<S>4052</S> seven<S>2033</S> baskets<S>4711</S> full<S>4134</S>.
And<S>1161</S> they that did eat<S>2068</S> were<S>2258</S> four thousand<S>5070</S> men<S>435</S>, beside<S>5565</S> women<S>1135</S> and<S>2532</S> children<S>3813</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he sent away<S>630</S> the multitude<S>3793</S>, and took<S>1684</S> ship<S>1519</S> <S>4143</S>, and<S>2532</S> came<S>2064</S> into<S>1519</S> the coasts<S>3725</S> of Magdala<S>3093</S>.
